tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
# MUOS SATCOM Navy Antenna Tender Announcement
## Reference Number
* CB-30-41517508

## Solicitation Number
* W8474-248453

## Tender Status
* Open
* Amendment Number: 0
* Publication Date: 2024-11-04

## Tender Closing Date
* 2024-12-13T14:00:00

## Expected Contract Start Date
* 2024-12-20

## Expected Contract End Date
* 2025-06-30

## Procurement Method
* Competitive - Open Bidding

## Contracting Entity Information
* Department of National Defense (DND)
* Address: 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada
* Contact: John Stevens, john.stevens3@forces.gc.ca, (343) 550-4564

## Tender Description
This notice invites bidders to submit tenders for the supply of MUOS SATCOM Navy Antennas (hereinafter referred to as "the Products"). The Products are required to meet the specified technical requirements and standards outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP).

## Items and Quantities
* Item 1: 30 Pieces, Part No.: 20-30-66F55, NCAGE: KCVB4, Unit of Issue: EACH, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* Item 2: 25 Pieces, Part No.: 20-30-66F55, NCAGE: KCVB4, Unit of Issue: EACH, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, Victoria, British Columbia

## Trade Agreements
This tender is open to all suppliers and is eligible under the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).
